basics.name: Evan Hernandez
basics.label: Junior Developer
basics.summary: Aspiring Programming Enthusiast | Passionate about Crafting Exceptional Digital Experiences | Specializing in Game Development at Alamo Colleges District

work.summary: Lead baristas are instrumental in building customer relationships and fostering a positive and friendly store environment. They also provide technical guidance to new team members and assist in the training program.
highlights: Welcoming customers, informing them about specials or new items, answering questions, and accepting orders and payments
Preparing specialty coffee drinks of the very highest quality, as well as teas and other beverages
Maintain coffee knowledge on current offerings and clearly communicate product information to customers

awards.title: Web Programming, Occupational Skills Award
awards.summary: The Computer Programming Occupational Skills award is a basic introduction to web programming and a starting point for the Level 1 Certificate.
